Desc.entry: The centre is open to everyone. Activities include lunch clubs, tai chi, Wing Chun classes, the Kinhon Project, the Chinese Youth Participation Project and a Mental Health Project (see separate entries). Facilities include offices and a meeting room. Arranges Chinese New Year celebration, mid-autumn festival and Dragon Boat Festival. Offers English classes (ESOL) with IT, basic Chinese painting classes, and food and hygiene courses.
